name: EruditionNetworkTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open erudition network trivia”
”Alexa, start erudition network trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: erudition network trivia
des: Think you know these Black History facts? Take the Erudition Network Black History Challenge! The questions cover commonly known Black History facts and other facts that are not often discussed or taught. Test your skills alone or with other contestants. You can only get three wrong so give it your best shot. If you are seeking to learn more join us on The Erudition Network on FaceBook and Youtube. Become a Black History genuis in the comfort of your own home.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
